Frequently Ask Question's

Haven't found what you're looking for?
Try the oval Resourse center or contact us

How is the free Personal Plan different from the Personal Pro and Team plan?

Upgrade to the personal pro Plan for unlimited guests, or the Team Plan If you collaborate with the same group of people automatically. You can also review remove inactive guests in setting & Members

What happens when I go over the guest limit on my personal Plan?

Upgrade to the personal pro Plan for unlimited guests, or the Team Plan If you collaborate with the same group of people automatically. You can also review remove inactive guests in setting & Members

How do I try out the Team Plan for free?

Upgrade to the personal pro Plan for unlimited guests, or the Team Plan If you collaborate with the same group of people automatically. You can also review remove inactive guests in setting & Members

Can I use Notion for free ?

Upgrade to the personal pro Plan for unlimited guests, or the Team Plan If you collaborate with the same group of people automatically. You can also review remove inactive guests in setting & Members

Do you offer student discounts ?

Upgrade to the personal pro Plan for unlimited guests, or the Team Plan If you collaborate with the same group of people automatically. You can also review remove inactive guests in setting & Members
